full_summary:
=================
### Government Tender Announcement
#### 23375-240260 Bulk Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Delivery System

* **Reference Number:** WS4229824239-Doc4263271822
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4229824239
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-17
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-17T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-18
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-27

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Proponents to participate in a competitive bidding process for the supply and installation of a bulk carbon dioxide (CO2) delivery system. The successful Proponent will be required to provide a CO2 delivery system in support of the High Pressure Research Facility for a period of 5 years.

The procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the following free trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

750 litres per minute CO2 flow requirement for the High Pressure Research Facility

**Key Contract Details**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact: Nicole Zimmerling, [nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Details**

* Tender Description: Requirement for a bulk carbon dioxide (CO2) delivery system in support of the High Pressure Research Facility for 5 years.
* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17743903?extsite=MTc3NDM5MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
* Attachment: None

Note: The deadline for submission is 2023-11-17T14:00:00. The tender has been marked as "Cancelled
